Engineering.name: JEE (Main & Advanced)
Engineering.info: The most prominent entrance exam for undergraduate engineering programs (B.Tech/BE) in India, including admission to IITs, NITs, and other top engineering colleges.

Engineering.name: GATE
Engineering.info: A national-level examination for admission into Postgraduate (M.Tech/MS) and Doctoral (PhD) programs, and also for PSU recruitment.

Engineering.name: BITSAT
Engineering.full_name: Birla Institute of Technology and Science Admission Test
Engineering.info: A computer-based online test for admission to integrated first-degree programs of BITS Pilani at its campuses in Pilani, Goa, and Hyderabad.

Engineering.name: VITEEE
Engineering.full_name: Vellore Institute of Technology Engineering Entrance Examination
Engineering.info: Entrance exam for admission to undergraduate engineering programs in Vellore Institute of Technology (VIT) campuses.

Engineering.name: State CETs (MHT-CET, KCET, etc.)
Engineering.info: Exams conducted by individual state governments for admission to engineering colleges within that state (e.g., MHT-CET for Maharashtra, KCET for Karnataka).

Medical.name: NEET-UG
Medical.info: The single entrance examination for admission to MBBS and BDS courses in all medical institutions in India, including AIIMS and JIPMER.

Medical.name: NEET-PG / INI-CET
Medical.full_name: National Eligibility cum Entrance Test (Postgraduate) / Institute of National Importance Combined Entrance Test
Medical.info: Qualifying entrance examinations for admission to various MD/MS and PG Diploma courses. INI-CET is for top institutes like AIIMS, JIPMER, and PGIMER.
colleges: Top medical colleges for postgraduate specialization

Management.name: CAT
Management.info: The primary entrance test for admission to MBA/PGDM programs in the Indian Institutes of Management (IIMs) and other top business schools.

Management.name: GMAT
Management.info: A globally recognized exam for admission to MBA and other graduate management programs. Required by top Indian B-Schools like ISB and for studying abroad.

Management.name: XAT
Management.info: An important MBA entrance exam conducted by XLRI Jamshedpur, used by over 160 business schools for admission.

Management.name: SNAP
Management.info: The mandatory entrance exam for admission to the 16 institutes under Symbiosis International (Deemed) University.

Law.name: CLAT
Law.info: A centralized national level entrance test for admissions to 24 National Law Universities (NLUs) in India for undergraduate (BA LLB) and postgraduate (LLM) programs.

Law.name: AILET
Law.info: Conducted by National Law University Delhi (NLU Delhi) exclusively for admission to its BA LLB (Hons), LLM, and PhD programs.

Architecture & Design.name: NATA
Architecture & Design.info: A national-level undergraduate exam for admission to 5-year B.Arch degree courses. It measures aptitude in drawing, observation, and critical thinking.

Architecture & Design.name: UCEED
Architecture & Design.full_name: Undergraduate Common Entrance Examination for Design
Architecture & Design.info: A national-level entrance exam for admission to Bachelor of Design (B.Des) programs at IITs.

Architecture & Design.name: NID DAT
Architecture & Design.full_name: National Institute of Design Design Aptitude Test
Architecture & Design.info: A two-stage entrance exam for admission to Bachelor and Master of Design programs at the prestigious National Institutes of Design.

Architecture & Design.name: NIFT Entrance Exam
Architecture & Design.full_name: National Institute of Fashion Technology Entrance Exam
Architecture & Design.info: The primary entrance exam for admission to design, management, and technology programs at the National Institutes of Fashion Technology.

Commerce & Finance.name: CA Exams
Commerce & Finance.info: A series of professional examinations (Foundation, Intermediate, Final) conducted by ICAI to become a certified Chartered Accountant.

Commerce & Finance.name: CS Exams
Commerce & Finance.info: Professional exams (CSEET, Executive, Professional) by ICSI to become a Company Secretary, an expert in corporate law and governance.

Commerce & Finance.name: CMA Exams
Commerce & Finance.info: Professional exams (Foundation, Intermediate, Final) by ICMAI for certification as a Cost & Management Accountant, specializing in cost and management accounting.

Humanities & Social Sciences.name: CUET
Humanities & Social Sciences.info: A national-level entrance examination for admission to various undergraduate programs in Central, State, and other participating universities.

Humanities & Social Sciences.name: UGC NET
Humanities & Social Sciences.full_name: University Grants Commission National Eligibility Test
Humanities & Social Sciences.info: A test to determine the eligibility for Assistant Professor and/or Junior Research Fellowship (JRF) award in Indian universities.

Humanities & Social Sciences.name: TISSNET
Humanities & Social Sciences.full_name: Tata Institute of Social Sciences National Entrance Test
Humanities & Social Sciences.info: Entrance test for admission to various MA programs in Social Work, Human Resources Management, and other social sciences at the Tata Institute of Social Sciences.

Hotel Management.name: NCHMCT JEE
Hotel Management.full_name: National Council for Hotel Management and Catering Technology Joint Entrance Examination
Hotel Management.info: A national-level entrance exam for admission to B.Sc. in Hospitality and Hotel Administration programs offered by IHMs and other institutions.

Agriculture.name: ICAR AIEEA
Agriculture.full_name: Indian Council of Agricultural Research All India Entrance Examination for Admission
Agriculture.info: An entrance exam for admission to Bachelor, Master, and Doctoral degree programs in agriculture and allied sciences.

Defence Services.name: NDA & NA Exam
Defence Services.full_name: National Defence Academy & Naval Academy Examination
Defence Services.info: Conducted by UPSC for admission to the Army, Navy, and Air Force wings of the NDA for 10+2 candidates.

Defence Services.name: CDS Exam
Defence Services.info: Conducted by UPSC for recruiting officers into the Indian Military Academy, Officers Training Academy, Indian Naval Academy, and Indian Air Force Academy.

Civil Services.name: UPSC CSE
Civil Services.full_name: Union Public Service Commission Civil Services Examination
Civil Services.info: A nationwide competitive examination for recruitment to various Civil Services of the Government of India, including IAS, IPS, and IFS.
